document_data.name: Myo-Myo
document_data.mainbody: '''Myo-Myo''' was a famous [[ghost]] hunter from [[T'u Lung]] in [[Kara-Tur]], active sometime before the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Myo-Myo gained fame by hunting down and slaying [[ghost]]s, [[demon]]s, and many other foul spirits that plagued the good folk of the land. She carried an impressive collection of fantastic [[magic]] equipment, including ''[[Myo-Myo's gong|gong]]'' â€“ a [[shield]] and a gold, enchanted by the monastics of the [[Seven Stone Monks Temple]]. By the {{YearlinkName|1312}}, ''Myo-Myo's gong'' was no longer in her possession and found its way to the frigid [[Icewind Dale]].
